summary: Tested Model Type feature for Dimeda Service Pro. All features working correctly: Products have model_type field (powered/roll_in), Products page has Model Type filter, Admin/Customer Issue forms have City and Model Type filters, SLA timer correctly skips Roll-in Stretcher issues.

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All Model Type features verified via Playwright)

seed_data_creation: Updated VLN-005 product to have model_type='roll_in' (was 'powered')
context_for_next_testing_agent: Model Type feature is fully functional. VLN-005 is the only Roll-in Stretcher product. SLA timer logic correctly skips roll_in products in Issues.jsx, Services.jsx, TechnicianCalendar.jsx, TechnicianServices.jsx, and MaintenanceCalendar.jsx.

product_model_type_field.notes: Products API returns model_type field with values 'powered' or 'roll_in'. Default is 'powered'.

products_page_model_type_filter.notes: Products page has Model Type filter dropdown with 'All Types', 'Powered Stretcher', 'Roll-in Stretcher' options

product_form_model_name_free_text.notes: Model Name is a free text input field in Add/Edit Product form

product_form_model_type_dropdown.notes: Model Type is a dropdown with 'Powered Stretcher' and 'Roll-in Stretcher' options

admin_issue_form_city_filter.notes: Admin Issue form has City dropdown filter for product selection

admin_issue_form_model_type_filter.notes: Admin Issue form has Model Type dropdown filter with 'All Types', 'Powered Stretcher', 'Roll-in Stretcher' options

customer_issue_form_city_filter.notes: Customer Dashboard issue form has City dropdown filter

customer_issue_form_model_type_filter.notes: Customer Dashboard issue form has Model Type dropdown filter

sla_timer_powered_stretcher.notes: SLA timer IS shown for Powered Stretcher customer issues with technician assigned (e.g., 'Ratukas' issue shows '9h 3m left')

sla_timer_roll_in_stretcher.notes: SLA timer is NOT shown for Roll-in Stretcher customer issues (verified with test issue for VLN-005)

model_type_info_hidden_in_issue_display.notes: Model Type info is not displayed in issue cards - only serial number, city, and location are shown
